block.p: * American Dairy Brands, Columbus, Ohio, a division of Dairy Farmers of America, to BBDO Chicago, part of Omnicom Group, as the agency of record for the company, which is licensed to market cheese and other dairy products bearing the Borden and Elsie trademarks. Those duties had been handled by Sive/ Young & Rubicam, Cincinnati, owned by Young & Rubicam Inc., which parted ways with American Dairy in December. Billings were estimated at more than $15 million. * Ericsson Mobile Phones, Miami, to Wunderman Cato Johnson, Chicago and Miami, part of Young & Rubicam Inc., as the first agency to handle consumer and trade promotions in North America and Latin America. Billings were estimated at $15 million. Y.& R. Advertising, New York, handles advertising.
